name: Front Corpse
benefits: Calms the brain and helps relieve stress and mild depression.  Relaxes the body.  Reduces headache, fatigue and insomnia.  Helps to lower blood pressure.

name: Womb
benefits: Gently stretches the hips, thighs, and ankles.  Calms the brain and helps relieve stress and fatigue.  Relieves back and neck pain when done with head and torso supported.

name: Thunderbolt
benefits: Stretches the thighs, ankles, knees, and feet.  Improves posture and tones the pelvic muscles.

name: Corpse
benefits: Calms the brain and helps relieve stress and mild depression.  Relaxes the body.  Reduces headache, fatigue, and insomnia.  Helps to lower blood pressure.

name: Fish
benefits: A traditional text states that Matsyāsana is the "destroyer of all diseases".  Opens the chest, throat and abdomen.

name: Downward-Facing Dog
benefits: Calms the brain and helps relieve stress and mild depression.  Energizes the body.  Stretches the shoulders, hamstrings, calves, arches, and hands.  Strengthens the arms and legs.  Helps relieve the symptoms of menopause.  Relieves menstrual discomfort when done with the head supported.  Helps prevent osteoporosis.  Improves digestion.  Relieves headache, insomnia, back pain, and fatigue.  Therapeutic for high blood pressure, asthma, flat feet, sciatica, and sinusitis.  Warms up the ankles and the toes.

name: Downward-Facing Dog with Toe Raises
benefits: Calms the brain and helps relieve stress and mild depression.  Energizes the body.  Stretches the shoulders, hamstrings, calves, arches, and hands.  Strengthens the arms and legs.  Helps relieve the symptoms of menopause.  Relieves menstrual discomfort when done with the head supported.  Helps prevent osteoporosis.  Improves digestion.  Relieves headache, insomnia, back pain, and fatigue.  Therapeutic for high blood pressure, asthma, flat feet, sciatica, and sinusitis.  Warms up the ankles and the toes.

name: Forearm Balance
benefits: Strengthens arms and shoulders.  Improves focus and balance.  Stretches the upper and lower back.  Strengthens the abdominal muscles.  Tones the abdominal area.

name: Eight Point
benefits: Stretches the neck and shoulders and lengthens and realigns the spine.  It also strengthens the arms and upper body.

name: Float Back (Preparation)
benefits: Creates strength in your shoulders, wrists and abdominal muscles.

name: Easy Sit
benefits: Opens the hips and stretches the knees and ankles.  Strengthens the back.  Calms the mind, reduces stress and anxiety.  Improves circulation and blood flow to the pelvis.

name: Chin Stand
benefits: Strengthens back, hips, pelvis and legs.  Improves balance and flexibility of the back.

name: Seated Cow
benefits: Warms up and elongates the spine.

name: Extended Puppy
benefits: Stretches the spine and shoulders.

name: King Cobra
benefits: Opens the chest, shoulders and psoas.  Strengthens the spine.

name: Crane
benefits: Strengthens forearms, wrists, shoulders, upper back and abdominal muscles.

name: Extended Child's
benefits: Gently stretches the hips, thighs, and ankles.  Calms the brain and helps relieve stress and fatigue.  Relieves back and neck pain when done with head and torso supported.

name: Forearm Plank
benefits: Strengthens the arms, wrists, and spine.  Tones the abdomen.

name: Downward-Facing Dog with Bent Knees
benefits: Calms the brain and helps relieve stress and mild depression.  Energizes the body.  Stretches the shoulders, hamstrings, calves, arches, and hands.  Strengthens the arms and legs.  Helps relieve the symptoms of menopause.  Relieves menstrual discomfort when done with the head supported.  Helps prevent osteoporosis.  Improves digestion.  Relieves headache, insomnia, back pain, and fatigue.  Therapeutic for high blood pressure, asthma, flat feet, sciatica, and sinusitis.  Warms up the ankles, toes, knees and hamstrings.

name: Fish (Preparation)
benefits: Releases the neck.  Opens the belly and chest.  Strengthens the spine and shoulders.

name: Forearm Plank on the Knees
benefits: Strengthens the arms, shoulders, wrists and spine.  Tones the abdomen.

name: Cow
benefits: Removes fatigue.  Improves breathing and the circulation of blood to the brain.  Rejuvenates the entire body.

name: Dolphin with Toe Raises
benefits: Stretches the shoulders, hamstrings, calves, arches, and toes.  Strengthens the arms and legs.  Warms up the shoulders, ankles and toes.

name: Extended Bound Lotus
benefits: Stretches the knees, ankles, and hips.  Strengthens the spine and upper back.

name: Toe Squat
benefits: Stretches the toes and ankles.  Strengthens the knee joints.

name: Hero
benefits: Stretches the thighs, knees, and ankles.  Strengthens the arches.  Improves digestion and relieves gas.  Helps relieve the symptoms of menopause.  Reduces swelling of the legs during pregnancy (through second trimester).  Therapeutic for high blood pressure and asthma.

name: Tortoise
benefits: Stretches the insides and backs of the legs and the groin.  Stretches the shoulders.  Strengthens the back and abdominal muscles.

name: Supine Hero
benefits: Stretches the abdomen, thighs and deep hip flexors (psoas), knees, and ankles.  Strengthens the arches.  Relieves tired legs.  Improves digestion.  Helps relieves the symptoms of menstrual pain.

name: Bridge
benefits: Stretches the chest, neck, and spine.  Stimulates abdominal organs, lungs, and thyroids.  Rejuvenates tired legs.  Improves digestion.  Helps relieve the symptoms of menopause.  Relieves menstrual discomfort when done supported.  Reduces anxiety, fatigue, backache, headache, and insomnia.  Therapeutic for asthma, high blood pressure, osteoporosis, and sinusitis.

name: Wind Removing with Head Tucked
benefits: Releases the back and spine.

name: Firefly
benefits: Strengthens arms and wrists.  Improves focus and concentration.  Opens flexibility of lower body.

name: Deaf Man's
benefits: Creates a deep release and internal balance.

name: Sleeping Tortoise
benefits: Stretches the insides and backs of the legs and the groin.  Stretches the shoulders.  Strengthens the back and abdominal muscles.

name: Wind Removing
benefits: Releases the back and the spine.  A nice release from backbends.

name: Supported Camel
benefits: Stretches the entire front of the body, the ankles, thighs, abdomen and chest.  Stretches the deep hip flexors (psoas).  Strengthens back muscles.  Improves posture.

name: Dolphin
benefits: Calms the brain and helps relieve stress and mild depression.  Energizes the body.  Stretches the shoulders, hamstrings, calves, arches, and hands.  Strengthens the arms and legs.  Helps relieve the symptoms of menopause.  Relieves menstrual discomfort when done with the head supported.  Helps prevent osteoporosis.  Improves digestion.  Relieves headache, insomnia, back pain, and fatigue.  Therapeutic for high blood pressure, asthma, flat feet, sciatica, and sinusitis.  Warms up the ankles and the toes.

name: Crow (Preparation)
benefits: Strengthens arms, wrists and ankles.  Stretches the upper back.  Strengthens the abdominal muscles.  Opens the groin.  Tones the abdominal organs.

name: Supine Angle
benefits: Stretches the shoulders and spine.

name: Kneeling with Hands on Hips
benefits: Brings stillness and focus inward.

name: Bridge (Preparation)
benefits: Relaxes the body and relieves lower back tension.

name: Wheel (Preparation)
benefits: Creates mindful placement of the body in preparation for wheel pose and staying with proper form.

name: Inverted Staff
benefits: Stretches the entire front body and opens the chest.  Tones the internal organs.  Revitalizes the central nervous system.

name: Scorpion Chin Stand
benefits: Strengthens back, hips, pelvis and legs.  Improves balance and flexibility of the back.

name: Seated Wide Legged Forward Bend II
benefits: Improves balance and strengthens the core.  Stretches your hamstrings, abdominals, spine and hip flexors.

name: Reverse Table
benefits: Strengthens the arms, the wrists, and the legs.  Stretches the shoulders, the chest, and the front ankles.

name: Chair
benefits: Strengthens the ankles, thighs, calves, and spine.  Stretches shoulders and chest.  Stimulates the abdominal organs, diaphragm, and heart.  Reduces flat feet.  Energizes the entire body.

name: Lotus
benefits: Opens the hips, groin and stretches the knees, ankles and thighs.  Strengthens the back and calms the mind, reduces stress and anxiety.  Improves circulation and blood flow in the pelvis.

name: Camel
benefits: Stretches the entire front of the body, the ankles, thighs and groins, abdomen and chest, and throat.  Stretches the deep hip flexors (psoas).  Strengthens back muscles.  Improves posture.  Stimulates the organs of the abdomen and neck.

name: Mountain with Supported Backbend
benefits: Stretches the entire front of the body, the ankles, thighs, abdomen and chest.  Strengthens back muscles.  Improves posture.

name: Mountain
benefits: Improves posture.  Strengthens thighs, knees, and ankles.  Firms abdomen and buttocks.  Relieves sciatica.  Reduces flat feet.

name: Upward-Facing Dog
benefits: Improves posture.  Strengthens the spine, arms, and wrists.  Stretches the chest, lungs, shoulders, and abdomen.  Firms the buttocks.  Stimulates abdominal organs.  Helps relieve mild depression, fatigue, and sciatica.  Therapeutic for asthma.

name: Box
benefits: Increases abdominal strength.  Warms up the joints, muscles of arms and the legs.

name: Caterpillar
benefits: Stretches the spine and kidneys, compresses the stomach to improve digestion.

name: Little Thunderbolt
benefits: Stretches the entire front of the body, the ankles, thighs and groins, abdomen and chest, and throat.  Stretches the deep hip flexors (psoas).  Strengthens the back muscles.

name: Seated Cat
benefits: Warms up and elongates the spine.

name: Cat
benefits: Relieves the spine and neck.  Energizes the body.
